Bahá'u'lláh

Bahá'u'lláh, founder of the Bahá'í Faith, declared himself the "Promised One" of all religions and the fulfiller of messianic prophecies, thus undercutting all other belief systems, including his native Islam.

O people of the Qur’án, Verily, the Prophet of God, Muhammad, sheddeth tears at the sight of your cruelty.
